dom:
<input aria-autocomplete="both" aria-haspopup="false" autocomplete="off" class="input-text" data-mage-init='{"quicksearch":{
                              "formselector":"#search_mini_form",
                              "url":"https://www.simplehuman.com/search/ajax/suggest/",
                              "destinationselector":"#search_autocomplete"}
                         }' id="search" maxlength="128" name="q" role="combobox" type="text" value=""/>

feature: first name firstname text first name
last name lastname text last name
email address email text e mail address

dom: <input class="l" id="address1" name="address1" placeholder="street address" type="text"/>
feature: address address1 text street address address1

dom: <input class="l" name="address2" placeholder="unit #, building, apt, etc." type="text"/>

dom: <input class="m" id="locality" maxlength="30" name="city" placeholder="city" size="20" type="text"/>
<input class="m" id="postal_code" maxlength="10" name="zipcode" placeholder="zipcode" size="20" type="text"/>

dom: <input class="l input-text required-entry" id="purchasedate" name="purchasedate" type="text"/>
